title: #443: Cannabis Shamans and Hashashin Assassins with Chris Bennet
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome Cannabis Historian Chris Bennet to the show to discuss the spiritual history of Cannabis and Humanity! Happy 420 everyone and thank you for your support.

Come See Sam Tripoli Live: All Tickets Available at Samtripoli.com

Phoenix AZ: April 22nd-23rd- The House of Comedy Az
https://www.showclix.com/event/sam-tripoli-9999998ix6KDGCd

Indianapolis: April 29th- May 1st- Helium Comedy Club
https://indianapolis.heliumcomedy.com/events/44240
